Name: loathe the game
About the game: The Devil has a new minion! (hint: its you.) Condem sinners to hell in loathe the game, all with the flick of the spacebar. Collect souls to power your soul meter and unlock evil upgrades to spawn more minions along the way. Each goal is something special to make the autoclicking expierience worthwhile and satisfying. Feel your robo-bones waste away as you do do the beasts dirty work, all in a slight chance that you may finally obtain a real heart. This is one game that you surely want to miss. Run whilst you still can... or... wheel in that case. (Part of the 'love the game' series)
